sentences.en: After our fifth goal the match became a rout.
sentences.cn: 我队进了第五个球以后,对方一败涂地.

sentences.en: But the decline, so far, has hardly been a panicked rout.
sentences.cn: 但是这一下跌至今为止并不是恐惧性卖出.

sentences.en: I once put a gang to rout.
It was the one pleasing thing in this whole rout of trouble.
sentences.cn: 这是全部祸患失败中唯一可喜的事情.

sentences.en: It's an utter rout, and your broadcasts are criminal lies.
sentences.cn: 这是一场溃败, 你广播的新闻都是可耻的谎言.

sentences.en: Many can claim to have seen the rout coming.
sentences.cn: 许多人宣称早已经看到即将到来的失败.

sentences.en: Raceme separation is the main rout for preparation of pure enantiomers.
sentences.cn: 外消旋体拆分是获得单一手性化合物的重要途径.

sentences.en: Rout him out of the bath!
Sometimes the boys would rout out little ground squirrels and chase them into the bush.
sentences.cn: 这些男孩子有时候会轰赶出一些小松鼠,追逐它们,直至它们逃进树丛.

sentences.en: The battle turned into a rout.
The busy rout of the street could be seen.
sentences.cn: 人们可以看见街上的喧嚣景象.

sentences.en: The enemy troops were put to rout all along the line.
The enemy was put to rout all along the line.
The main forces put all to rout wherever they went.
The people's army put all to rout wherever they went.
We must rout the last enemy soldier out of the town.
sentences.cn: 我必须将本镇的敌兵肃清.

sentences.en: Zidane completed the rout with a low shot from the edge of the penalty area.
sentences.cn: 齐达内在罚球区边缘的一记低射将对手彻底击败。

trans.tran_cn: 溃败，暴动，混乱的群众，盛大的晚会
trans.tran_en: a complete defeat in a battle, competition, or election

trans.tran_cn: 打垮，赶跑，挖掘出，（体育）打败对方
